tool_description: Get a random quote about mindfulness from a list of 100 quotes.

api_list.name: getMindfulnessQuote
api_list.description: Fetch a random mindfulness quote from a curated list.

optional_parameters.name: author
optional_parameters.description: Filter quotes by a specific author.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: Filter quotes by a specific category.
